questions.questionText: Son Heung-min is from what country?
Son was born in what year?
Son became a member of the South Korean national team in what year?
Son joined Tottenham Hotspur from which team?
Son scored his first premier league goal for Tottenham Hotspur against which team?
Son wears which number on his shirt for Tottenham Hotspur?
Son has won player of the season for Tottenham Hotspur how many times?
Son has won the Premier League golden boot how many times?
Tottenham Hotspur fans sing which song?

answers.answerText: Nice one Sonny, Nice one Son, Nice one Sonny, Let's have another one
Let's go Sonny, Let's go Son, Let's go Sonny, Let's score another one
Let's score Sonny, one more Son, Let's score Sonny, Let's have another goal
